review_data.title: Frisch und freundlich
review_data.content: Frisch, freundlich und locker - unser Abend war mit gutem Service und frischem Essen, dazu guter Weinempfehlung, sehr angenehm. Da...More

review_data.title: A breath of fresh air for food in Adliswil.
review_data.content: For years we've been dismayed at the lack of diversity in the restaurants in and around Adliswil (20 minutes south of Zürich). If you want Cordon Bleu, Pizza, Burgers, Kebabs, or Euro-Chinese then you're in luck from a host of local imbiss style restaurants. But...More
